title: 28 Ashburn Ct, Schaumburg Condo for Rent (Updated)
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   28 Ashburn Ct, V2, Schaumburg. Spacious 2nd Floor Unit Featuring updated kitchen cabinetry, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry plus ample space for kitchen table.  Vaulted ceilings in living room with skylights, double patio doors leading out to the large balcony with beautiful nature views.  Both baths have been updated. Master bed has walk-in closet.  In-Unit Laundry Room with full size washer and dryer.  Brand New A/C and Furnace.  1 car garage.  Sought after Towne Place subdivision with close proximity to shopping, transportation and dining.  Available September 1.  Non-Smoker Please! Good Credit A Must!
